item.description:
Afterwork Mixer this Thursday at Clerys

For young professionals alike in the heart of Boston's Back Bay neighborhood. 6:30-9:30pm.

The Afterwork mixer returns this Thursday October 19th. This time we are taking the party to Clerys a popular neighborhood venue in Boston's Back Bay neighborhood. Fall ( my personal favorite season) has fully arrived around Boston and what better way to come out this Thurs and have a few cocktails with the group as we gear up for another festive weekend!

Meeting details: We will meet at the bar area in the back room straight ahead from the main entrance. Please do not hesitate to call or text me upon arrival if you are having trouble finding the group. My picture is on the site under the Assistant Organizer section so I should not be hard to find. This place is packed on Thurs nites so I highly ENCOURAGE you to attend early as possible. My phone is 617-671-5310. Please make note prior to arriving. See you there!

Steven


Public Transportation:

Green Line to Copley/Prudential
Orange Line to Back Bay station

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: BackBay Afterwork Mixer this Thurs at Clerys!
